name: RED (itch) (Stay Retro)
description:
This is a short game made for the 3 hour long Tri Jam where the player must chase down a wanted criminal before he can escape. The controls are as follows - W A S D for basic movement, left click to fire weapon and finally the mouse can be used to look around.

Finally, the game was made in UE4 in around 4 hours and the music used was all royalty free. Due to the short time limit I decided to stick to the base geometry in order to get the core game's idea across and so no asset packs were used.
